config/packages/dev/jms_serializer.yaml.contents:
jms_serializer:
    visitors:
        json:
            options:
                - JSON_PRETTY_PRINT
                - JSON_UNESCAPED_SLASHES
                - JSON_PRESERVE_ZERO_FRACTION

config/packages/prod/jms_serializer.yaml.contents:
jms_serializer:
    visitors:
        json:
            options:
                - JSON_UNESCAPED_SLASHES
                - JSON_PRESERVE_ZERO_FRACTION

config/packages/jms_serializer.yaml.contents:
jms_serializer:
    visitors:
        xml:
            format_output: '%kernel.debug%'
